channel.title: resources on MR's cyber blog
channel.description: Recent content in resources on MR's cyber blog

item.title: resources
item.description: Let me explain my notes: The brackets() after each tool will indicate if the tool is: (built-in) = available in Kali’s repo. Simple sudo apt install *tool* (external *) = outside Kali’s repo. It’ll need downloaded then installed. (browser extension) = specified browser extension I’ll also try specifying any restrictions I know of. API access needed Paywalls etc etc etc OSINT AIO OSINT awesome osint (external website) Awesome OSINT is a large collection of resources dedicated to anything OSINT.
item.dc:creator: Matt Raupfer
